T02D1582:28b-33: dbus su chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi chos
T02D1582:28b-34: 'byung gi rnam pa kha yangs la rtsa ba phra

T02D1582:28b-37: rje la gnas pa'i bh'um yig las byung ba'i rnam

T02D1582:28b-41: mnyam pa'i phyir gru bzhir mnyam pa'o //

T02D1582:29a-4: ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang ser ge rnam par

T02D1582:29a-6: 'dod yon gyi snam bu bzhis bskor ba'o ;
T02D1582:29a-7: / bsam gtan bzhi rnam par dag pas rta babs bzhis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1582:29a-8: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pas
T02D1582:29a-9: dra ba dra phyed dang nyi zla dang ba dan
T02D1582:29a-10: dang me long dang rda yab kyis mdzes pa'o //
T02D1582:29a-11: 'dir bsdus nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dang
T02D1582:29a-12: de'i rnam par dag pas mtshan nyid de dag dang
T02D1582:29a-13: ldan pa'o // de'i lte bar 'jig rten gyi chos
T02D1582:29a-14: brgyad kyis ma gos pa'i rnam par dag pas pam
T02D1582:29a-15: yig dmar po las skyes pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1582:29a-16: pa'i ze'u 'brul ma rig pa'i mun pa 'joms pa
T02D1582:29a-17: rnam par dag pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyis
T02D1582:29a-18: 'gyur gyi a'a li yongs su gyur pa las me
T02D1582:29a-19: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi zla
T02D1582:29a-21: da dha da dha ya la dang bcas pa'i k'a
T02D1582:29a-22: li nyis 'gyur yongs su gyur pa las mnyam pa
T02D1582:29a-23: nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi nyi ma'i
T02D1582:29a-24: dkyil 'khor gnyes brtsegs pa bde ba chen po'i kha
T02D1582:29a-25: sbyor gyi dbus su bam yig dmar po las skyes
T02D1582:29a-26: pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i nyi ma
T02D1582:29a-27: la gnas pa'i bam gi sa bon so sor rtog
T02D1582:29a-28: pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1582:29a-29: de las byung ba'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas
T02D1582:29a-30: bcom ldan 'das ma'i rnam pas sems can gyi don
T02D1582:29a-31: byas nas yang de nyid la bsdus la bya ba

T02D1582:29a-34: nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings
T02D1582:29a-35: kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das ma
T02D1582:29a-37: chags pa chen po rnam par dag pas me tog se 'bru lta dmar po'o //
T02D1582:29a-38: bden pa gnyis rnam par dag pas phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1582:29a-39: g-yas sdigs mdzub dang bcas te gyen du bsgrengs pas
T02D1582:29a-40: gdug pa rnams la sdigs par byed cing ye shes
T02D1582:29a-41: la ro gcig tu gyur pa rnam par dag pas
T02D1582:29a-42: rdo rje dmar po bsnams pa'o //
T02D1582:29a-43: thur du rtse gcig pa gyen du rtse lngar yod
T02D1582:29a-44: pa nag po yu ba dang bcas pa skam po
T02D1582:29a-45: dang rlon pa'i mgo bo dang /
T02D1582:29b-0: sna @29b tshogs rdo rje dang gser gyi bum pa'i rtsa ba nas 'thon pa /
T02D1582:29b-1: g-yer kha'i sgra dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs kyi ba

T02D1582:29b-3: kha tv'am ga dkar po dpung ba'i drung du brten
T02D1582:29b-4: pa'o // bde ba chen po dang snying rje chen
T02D1582:29b-5: po ro gcig ba'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pas
T02D1582:29b-6: khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1582:29b-7: log pa'i lta ba rnam par rtog pa spangs pas rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal gcig pa /
T02D1582:29b-8: bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms pas mche ba gcigs [*gtsigs?] shing 'jigs su rung ba lus dang ngag dang /
T02D1582:29b-9: yid kyi rnam par dag pas snying rje'i spyan dmar
T02D1582:29b-10: po gsum pa can gnyis su med pa de kho
T02D1582:29b-11: na nyid kyi chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi
T02D1582:29b-12: stong rnam par bstan pa'i rnam par dag pas skra
T02D1582:29b-13: grol ba / 'khor lo dang rna rgyan dang /
T02D1582:29b-17: ske rags te phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o /
T02D1582:29b-18: kha cig ni mgul rgyan dang /
T02D1582:29b-21: spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo'i rgyan dang /
T02D1582:29b-23: thal ba ste phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags zhes bya ste /
T02D1582:29b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi 'dren pa mo nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D1582:29b-25: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab pa'o zhes zer ro
T02D1582:29b-26: // phyogs kyi gos can lang tsho la bab pa nyid kyis gzhon sha dang bcas pa /
T02D1582:29b-27: a'a li dang k'a li'i yi ge lnga bcu'i rang
T02D1582:29b-28: bzhin rgyu ma la brgyus pa'i mi mgo rlon pa'i
T02D1582:29b-29: phreng ba can / 'gro ba la stod pas khyab
T02D1582:29b-30: par mtshon pa nyid kyis zhabs g-yon pa bskum pas
T02D1582:29b-31: g-yas mtho lngar brkyang ba'i stang stabs kyis padma dmar
T02D1582:29b-32: po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng gi nyi ma la
T02D1582:29b-33: rtag pa dang chad pa'i rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1582:29b-34: 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan ma mnan pa /
T02D1582:29b-35: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi snang
T02D1582:29b-36: ba ldan pas nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can
T02D1582:29b-37: / stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'gro ba
T02D1582:29b-38: mi dmigs par mnyam pas gzi brjid chen po dang

T02D1582:29b-42: / 'dzag pa / // rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis
T02D1582:29b-43: kyi dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin
T02D1582:30a-0: gyi thod pa'i dum bu'i cod pan bcings @30a *
T02D1582:30a-2: /'gro ba'i don mdzad pa nyid kyis sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thor tshugs can /
T02D1582:30a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bsdus pas mig dang /
T02D1582:30a-9: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang /
T02D1582:30a-10: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste /
T02D1582:30a-11: rnam par shes pa brgyud bdag med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1582:30a-12: gyis dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na bzhugs par bsgom
T02D1582:30a-13: pa'o // gang l'u yi ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
T02D1582:30a-14: las rdo rje'i gur la sogs pa srung ba'i phyir
T02D1582:30a-15: rjes thobs su stong pa bsgom par gsungs pa gang
T02D1582:30a-16: yin bde ni dbang po rab kyi dbang du byas
T02D1582:30a-17: pa'o // pa ste / de la ni stong pa kho na bsrungs ba'i mchog go //
T02D1582:30a-18: 'dir ni skye bo thams cad rnam par sdud pa'i
T02D1582:30a-19: ched du stong pa bsgoms pa'i rjes su grur la
T02D1582:30a-20: sogs pa'i srung ba dang ldan par bstan te /
T02D1582:30a-21: de ni mngon par rtogs pa mang po las gro rims 'di ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1582:30a-22: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhi la rim pa
T02D1582:30a-23: ji lta bas g-yon skor gyis mkha' 'gro ma dang
T02D1582:30a-26: gzugs can ma rnams sku mdog nag po dang /
T02D1582:30a-30: thams cad kyang zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02D1582:30a-31: g-yon gyis kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1582:30a-33: gri gug g-yas kyis bsnams pa /
T02D1582:30a-34: spyan gsum pa zhal mche ba gtsigs pa skra grol
T02D1582:30a-35: ba gtser bu g-yas brkyang ba g-yon bskum pa'i stang
T02D1582:30a-36: stabs can / phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa mgo
T02D1582:30a-37: bo rlon pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa rdo rje'i
T02D1582:30a-38: phreng bas dpral bar nas mtshan pa /
T02D1582:30a-39: rked pa g-yer kha'i sgra dang bcas pa la sogs pas brgyan par bsam mo //
T02D1582:30a-40: me la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la
T02D1582:30a-41: g-yas skor gyis byang chub kyi sems dang khrag dang
T02D1582:30a-42: bdud rtsi lnga dang dngul chu ltar bdud rtsir gyur
T02D1582:30a-43: pas yongs su gang ba'i padma'i snod bzhi dgod do
T02D1582:30a-44: // de'i phyi rol du rdo rje sngon po'i phreng
T02D1582:30a-45: bas bskor ba dang po thugs kyi 'khor lo sngon
T02D1582:30a-46: po rtsibs brgyad pa'i shar dang /
T02D1582:30a-48: nub dang lho'i rtsibs rnams la pull'i'i ra m'a la yang /
T02D1582:30a-51: aarbu da'i rang bzhin gyi gnas la rab tu gtum mo dang /
T02D1582:30b-0: gtum @30b pa'i mig can ma dang /
T02D1582:30b-6: dbang ldan la go d'a ba r'i dang /
T02D1582:30b-9: m'a la ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnas dang /
T02D1582:30b-10: nye ba'i gnas la dpa' bo'i blo gros ma dang /
T02D1582:30b-14: padma'i phreng ba dmar pos bskor ba'i gnyis pa gsung
T02D1582:30b-15: gi 'khor lo dmar po rtsibs brgyad pa'i shar dang
T02D1582:30b-16: byang gi rtsibs gnyis la k'a ma r'u pa dang
T02D1582:30b-17: / ao tra'i zhing gnyis la aee r'a ba t'i dang /
T02D1582:30b-19: nub dang lho'i tri sha ku ni dang /
T02D1582:30b-20: ko sa la'i bdag nyid kyi nye ba'i zhing gnyis
T02D1582:30b-21: la rlung gi shugs can ma dang chang 'thung ma'o
T02D1582:30b-22: // me dang bden bral gnyis la ka lingga dang /
T02D1582:30b-23: lam pa ka ste tshando ha gnyis la shy'a ma de bi dang shin tu bzang mo'o //
T02D1582:30b-24: rlung dang dbang ldan du k'a nytsi dang hi m'a
T02D1582:30b-25: la ya ste nye ba'i tsha ndo ha gnyis la
T02D1582:30b-26: rta rna ma dang bya gdong ma'o //
T02D1582:30b-27: gsum pa sku'i 'khor lo dkar po'i rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D1582:30b-28: 'khor lo'i phreng ba dkar pos bskor z'i shar dang
T02D1582:30b-29: byang gi rtsibs la pre ta p'i ri dang gri
T02D1582:30b-30: ha de ba ta ste 'du ba can gnyis la
T02D1582:30b-33: nub dang lho'i soo r'a shta dang /
T02D1582:30b-34: su warnn di pa ste nye ba'i 'du ba can la /
T02D1582:30b-37: me dang bden bral la n'a ga ra dang /
T02D1582:30b-38: sindhu sti dur khrod la shin tu dpa' mo dang /
T02D1582:30b-40: rlung dang ldan du ma ru dang /
T02D1582:30b-41: ku la t'a ste nye ba'i dur khrod la 'khor los sgyur ma dang /
T02D1582:30b-43: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo de
T02D1582:30b-44: dag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i g-yon gyis khrag gis
T02D1582:30b-46: g-yas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pas gdug pa can tshar gcod pa'i gri gug pa bsnams pa'o /
T02D1582:30b-47: 'di dag gi rgyan la sogs pa'i cha lugs gzhan ni mkha' 'gro ma sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1582:30b-48: sgor bzhi la khva gdong ma dang /
T02D1582:30b-49: 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang /
T02D1582:30b-50: phag gdong ma rnams ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1582:31a-0: 'di rnams kyi gdong la ni ming dang rjes su mthun @31a * //
T02D1582:31a-2: / mtshams bzhi la gshin rje brtan ma dang /
T02D1582:31a-3: gshin rje pho nya ma dang /
T02D1582:31a-4: gshin rje mche ba can ma dang /
T02D1582:31a-5: gshin rje 'joms ma ste mi'i gdong pa can no //
T02D1582:31a-6: g-yas dang cig shos kyi phyogs kyi lha mo gnyis
T02D1582:31a-7: kyi sku'i g-yas dang cig shos kyi phyed lta bur
T02D1582:31a-8: sku phyed pa'o // brgyad car yang ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1582:31a-9: cha lugs lhag ma rnams mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa kho na bzhin no //
T02D1582:31a-10: lha mo de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das ma grub
T02D1582:31a-11: pa dang dus mnyam pa kho nar skad cig gis
T02D1582:31a-12: rdzogs par blta'o // de nas go cha gnyis byas nas //
T02D1582:31a-13: ye shes 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D1582:31a-14: zhes l'u'i pas gsungs pa'i srung pa'i go cha bgo bar bya ste /
T02D1582:31a-19: ha'i yi ge dag gis skye mched dag par byas nas phag mo dang /
T02D1582:31a-24: gtum mo ste lha mo drug gi sngags kyis rang
T02D1582:31a-25: rang gi lha'i kha dog dang mtshungs pa'i go cha
T02D1582:31a-26: bgo bar bya'o // lte ba la aom bam /
T02D1582:31a-32: yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha phat phat /
T02D1582:31a-33: yang na lha dang sngags de dang de las grub
T02D1582:31a-34: pa'i gnas de dang der lha de dag kho na
T02D1582:31a-35: bsgom par bya'o // de la phag mo dmar mo dang /
T02D1582:31a-38: g-yon pa la kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D1582:31a-42: gri gug dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams pa /
T02D1582:31a-47: gtum mo rnams kyi kha dog ni sngon mo dang /
T02D1582:31a-52: phyag bzhi'i g-yon gyis thod pa dang bcas pa'i kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D1582:31a-54: g-yas kyis cang te'u dang gri gug bsnams pa /
T02D1582:31a-55: thams cad kyang skra grol ba gcer bu spyan gsum
T02D1582:31a-56: pa g-yon bskum pa g-yas brkyang ba'i stang stabs kyis
T02D1582:31a-57: bzhugs par blta'o // de'i rjes la dpral ba dang /
T02D1582:31a-59: snying gar aom a'a: h'um gi yi ge dkar po dang /
T02D1582:31b-0: @31b dmar po dang sngon po rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1582:31b-1: de nas snying ga'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab
T02D1582:31b-2: ma brgyad pa la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1582:31b-3: gyi steng du rdo rje dmar po'i lte ba la
T02D1582:31b-4: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sa bon bam
T02D1582:31b-5: gyi 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i dbang
T02D1582:31b-6: phyug gi dpa' mo rnams su bsdus pa'i ye shes
T02D1582:31b-7: kyi 'khor lo'i gzugs dza:zhes pas spyan drangs la pi
T02D1582:31b-8: wang ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu drug gis
T02D1582:31b-9: mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod
T02D1582:31b-10: la / phem yig brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D1582:31b-11: dra ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas dpral ba'i dbus su
T02D1582:31b-13: h'um yig gis rang dam tshig gi 'khor lo la
T02D1582:31b-14: chu la chu thim pa ltar gzhug par bya ste
T02D1582:31b-15: / pam yig gis bcings la ho:yig gis dgyes par bya'o //
T02D1582:31b-16: aom yo ga shuddha:sarbba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1582:31b-18: ye shes 'khor lo dang dus mnyam par spyan drangs
T02D1582:31b-19: pa'i rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje ma rnams kyis
T02D1582:31b-20: ye shes kyi bdud rtsis bkang ba'i thod pa dang
T02D1582:31b-21: da ma ru bsnams pa la /
T02D1582:31b-22: snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i pi wang ma
T02D1582:31b-23: la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod par bya
T02D1582:31b-24: ste / ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni//
T02D1582:31b-25: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02D1582:31b-26: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1582:31b-27: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
T02D1582:31b-28: zhes pas de rnams kyi g-yon pa'i thod pa cung
T02D1582:31b-29: zad yo ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi bdud
T02D1582:31b-30: rtsi'i rgyun gyis bkrus pas rang nyid bde ba chen
T02D1582:31b-31: po'i rang bzhin du bsam mo //
T02D1582:31b-32: chu lhag ma las grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mgo bo la rnam par bsams la /
T02D1582:31b-33: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D1582:31b-34: ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes bya bas
T02D1582:31b-36: de la bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyi bo la rigs
T02D1582:31b-37: kyi bdag po sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad do
T02D1582:31b-38: // mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1582:31b-39: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo la bzhugs pa
T02D1582:31b-40: rnams la rim pa ji lta bar mi bskyod pa
T02D1582:31b-41: dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02D1582:31b-43: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams kyi ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1582:32a-2: yam yig las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D1582:32a-3: de'i steng du ram yig las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1582:32a-4: de'i steng du a'a: yig dkar po las skyes pa'i padma'i snod dkar po /
T02D1582:32a-5: mgo bo gsum las byas pa'i sbyed po gsum la gnas pa la /
T02D1582:32a-12: las skyes pa des byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga rdzogs par byas la /
T02D1582:32a-13: rlung gis bskul ba'i me 'bar ba'i drod kyis sa
T02D1582:32a-14: bon gyi yi ge la sogs pa zhu bas nyi
T02D1582:32a-15: ma 'char ba'i kha dog lta bu'i khu bar bltas
T02D1582:32a-16: la / steng du mtho gang pa'i tshad la h'um
T02D1582:32a-17: dkar po las skyes pa'i kha tv'am ga mgo thur
T02D1582:32a-18: la bstan pa dkar po bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la
T02D1582:32a-19: rlongs pa reg pas zhu ba nang du bab pas
T02D1582:32a-20: khu ba de dngul chu'i kha dog ltar bsil bar
T02D1582:32a-22: yang de'i steng du yi ge gsum gong nas gong
T02D1582:32a-23: du bltas nas de'i 'od zer gyis khams gsum na
T02D1582:32a-24: gnas pa'i bdud rtsi thams cad dang bcas te /

T02D1582:41b-42: phat sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis gong bzhin
T02D1582:41b-43: du bdud rtsir gyur pa'i gtor ma dbul lo //
T02D1582:42a-0: khyad par du tshes brgyad la sogs pa'i dus kyi mtshan mo dur khrod la sogs @42a * //
T02D1582:42a-2: tshul gzhan yang 'di nyid h'um dmar po las skyes pa'i dbu skra'i tshogs grol bar yang mthong ngo //
T02D1582:42a-3: gzhan yang ro'i gdan med pa yang yod de sngags rnams ni sngar gyi de nyid do //
T02D1582:42a-4: tshul gzhan yang rang gi lte ba la gnas pa'i
T02D1582:42a-5: padma dkar po dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i chos
T02D1582:42a-6: 'byung sindhu ra ltar dmar ba'i dbus su yi ge
T02D1582:42a-7: hr'i: ser po las byung ba'i sku mdog ser mo
T02D1582:42a-8: rang nyid kyi gri gug gis rang gi skye bcad
T02D1582:42a-9: nas mgo bo lag pa g-yon pa steng du brkyang
T02D1582:42a-10: bas 'dzin pa / lag pa g-yas pa gri gug 'og tu brkyang pas 'dzin pa /
T02D1582:42a-11: zhabs g-yas pa brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pa /
T02D1582:42a-12: skye las rtsa aa ba dd'u t'i'i lam las khrag gi rgyun 'thon nas de'i khar lhung ste /
T02D1582:42a-13: gzhan pha rol gyi rgyun gnyis ni la la n'a
T02D1582:42a-14: dang ra sa n'a las 'thon te ngos gnyis kyis
T02D1582:42a-15: rnal 'byor ma gnyis kyi khar 'jug pa bsgom par
T02D1582:42a-16: bya'o // de la g-yon pa'i ngos su rdo rje
T02D1582:42a-17: rab sngags ma ljang gu g-yon pas gri gug dang
T02D1582:42a-19: zhabs g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang ba'o //
T02D1582:42a-20: g-yas ngos su rnam par snang mdzad ma ser mo
T02D1582:42a-21: g-yas pas gri gug dang g-yon pas thod pa 'dzin
T02D1582:42a-22: pa zhabs g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pa'o //
T02D1582:42a-23: gzhan thams cad ni sngar bzhin no //
T02D1582:42a-24: aom sarbba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye /
T02D1582:42a-25: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat
T02D1582:42a-26: phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni bzlas pa'i sngags
T02D1582:42a-27: so // mchod pa'i rim pa ni mandala zur bzhi
T02D1582:42a-28: pa las nyi ma'i steng du chos 'byung bris nas
T02D1582:42a-29: de'i dbus su yi ge hr'im dam de las byung
T02D1582:42a-30: ba'i bcom ldan 'das sngar bshad pa'i gzugs can ma
T02D1582:42a-32: de la chos 'byung gi nang du /
T02D1582:42a-33: aom sarbba buddha d'a ki n'i ye zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis dang por mchod do //
T02D1582:42a-34: aom sarbba buddha d'a ki n'i ye h'um sv'a h'a
T02D1582:42a-35: zhes bya ba 'dis mchod yon la sogs pa dbul
T02D1582:42a-36: lo // g-yon du ni aom badzra warnna n'i ye h'um sv'a h'a dang /
T02D1582:42a-37: g-yas su aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya bas mchod do //
T02D1582:42a-38: de nas aa dya na dang purna gi ri dang
T02D1582:42b-0: ga ma ru @42b pa dang shr'i ha ta ta
T02D1582:42b-3: sprul sku dang bde ba chen po'i sku rnams la
T02D1582:42b-4: re re bzhi pa'i mthar thug gi ming dang spal
T02D1582:42b-6: aom gong du btags pa dang /
T02D1582:42b-7: tha mar sv'a h'a btags la mchod de sngar bzhin du gshes su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1582:42b-8: tshul gzhan yang 'di nyid rang gi lus khams gsum
T02D1582:42b-9: rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang du lhag par
T02D1582:42b-10: mos te / skad cig mas lte ba'i dkyil du
T02D1582:42b-11: phyag gnyis gri gug dang thod pa ldan pa skyil
T02D1582:42b-12: krung phyed pa'i gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa dza
T02D1582:42b-13: ba'i mi tog lta bu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1582:42b-14: de yi g-yas su phag zhal te //
T02D1582:42b-15: g-yon du khro mo'i zhal kho na //
T02D1582:42b-16: bden gnyis rnam par dag pa yis //
T02D1582:42b-17: zhal gnyis su ni brjod pa'o //
T02D1582:42b-18: de'i phyir 'di dag la sogs pa grub thob kyi
T02D1582:42b-19: man ngag las rim pa dang rim pas 'byung ba'i
T02D1582:42b-20: gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbye bas bcom ldan 'das ma'i
T02D1582:42b-21: man ngag gi bye brag mtha' yas pa'i dbye ba
T02D1582:42b-24: rim pa 'di rnams las rim pa gcig zhus nas
T02D1582:42b-25: dad pa can snying rje dang ldan pa dang chags
T02D1582:42b-26: pa dang bral ba dam tshig la gnas pa som
T02D1582:42b-27: nyi mi za bas bsgom pas nges par bsgrub par
T02D1582:42b-28: bya'o // gdams ngag las byung ba'i dus kyi mchod pa bri bar bya ste /
T02D1582:42b-29: tshes bcu la gur kum la sogs pas phyis pa'i
T02D1582:42b-30: dri ma med pa'i snod la sindhu ra btsags nas
T02D1582:42b-31: de'i dbus su gser gyi smyu gus chos 'byung mngon
T02D1582:42b-32: par bris te / de'i dbus su yi ge hr'im bri'o //
T02D1582:42b-33: yang na sa tsho gnyis mandala zur bzhi pa byas
T02D1582:42b-34: te dbus su sindhu ras chos 'byung bkod nas de
T02D1582:42b-35: la yi ge bam bris pa de'i dngos su g-yung
T02D1582:42b-36: drung gi phyag rgya bris pa las /
T02D1582:42b-37: chu las skyes pa dang skam las skyes pa'i me tog gis mchod de /
T02D1582:42b-38: ao dya na la sogs pa'i gnas bzhi dang sku bzhi gong bzhin du mchod do //
T02D1582:42b-39: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig
T02D1582:42b-40: gi rdzas 'byor ba bzhin du dbul bar bya zhing
T02D1582:42b-41: / gzhon nu ma rnams kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02D1582:43a-0: cho ga 'di ni gcer bu dang @43a * //
T02D1582:43a-1: skra grol ba dang lho phyogs su mngon par bltas
T02D1582:43a-2: te nye bar 'dug nas shin tu gsang zhing sbas
T02D1582:43a-3: pas bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o //
T02D1582:43a-4: de ma yin na dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1582:43a-5: nad rnams kyang so sor 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1582:43a-6: de nas gtor ma phul nas mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D1582:43a-7: dngos grub gsol ba btab ste gshegs su gsol lo
T02D1582:43a-8: // sindhu ra dang lha bshos la sogs pa ni gzhon nu ma rnams dang /
T02D1582:43a-9: yang na bud med yugs sa mo ma yin pa la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1582:43a-10: yang na tshes bcu'am tshes brgyad dam tshes bcu bzhi
T02D1582:43a-11: la bud med kyis 'tshong bar byed pa gang yang
T02D1582:43a-13: shing tog dang mar nag dang go la dang 'bras
T02D1582:43a-14: dang sngo dang zho dang me shing dang tshva dang
T02D1582:43a-15: sindhu ra dang ma dan la sogs pa cung zad
T02D1582:43a-16: ji ltar 'byor pas myos nas ci nus pa'i g-yogs
T02D1582:43a-17: byas te ; sngar bzhin du sindhu ra las byas
T02D1582:43a-18: ba'i chos 'byung la sa bon gyi yi ge la
T02D1582:43a-19: sogs pa bris nas yang dag par mchod la 'dod
T02D1582:43a-20: pa'i dngos grub la gsol ba gdab bcing gshegs su
T02D1582:43a-21: byas te ; gsol lo // gzhan thams cad ni sngar bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1582:43a-22: de'i rmi lam du rdo rje rnal 'byor ma lung ston pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag go //
T02D1582:43a-23: gzhan yang shin tu dag pa'i me long la tshes
T02D1582:43a-24: brgyad la sindhu ra bkram nas de la chos 'byung
T02D1582:43a-26: phyi'i zur rnams su bam gi sa bon rnam par bris la dbus su sngags bri bar bya'o //
T02D1582:43a-27: chos 'byung gi phyi rol gyi ngos bzhi la g-yung drung ris g-yon du 'khor bar bris la //
T02D1582:43a-28: me tog la sogs sbas yang dag par mchod cing
T02D1582:43a-29: sngags ji ltar nus pa yongs su bzlas te sindhu
T02D1582:43a-30: ra snod cig tu gzhag go //
T02D1582:43a-31: ji ltar ji srid zla ba drug gi bar du bya'o //
T02D1582:43a-32: de'i rjes la btsan dug lang ga li la sbu
T02D1582:43a-33: gu can gyi dbus su sindhu ra bcug nas dur
T02D1582:43a-34: khrod du sbas te gtor ma dang mchod pa byas
T02D1582:43a-35: nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i ched du sngags bzlas so
T02D1582:43a-36: // de ltar nyi ma re re zhing zla ba gcig bya'o //
T02D1582:43b-0: de nas sindhu ra des g-yung @43b drung ris kyi
T02D1582:43b-1: mdzod spu nas byas te bsod snyoms la grong khyer
T02D1582:43b-3: de'i tshe mdzod spu nas de bud med gang la
T02D1582:43b-4: 'phos par mthong bar 'gyur na de la 'bad pas
T02D1582:43b-5: bsnyen bkur bya'o // de lta bu'i grub thob ri
T02D1582:43b-6: khrod pa'i zhabs las byung ba'i tshul gyis g-yung drung
T02D1582:43b-7: gis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mnyes par byed pa'i
T02D1582:43b-8: bsnyen bkur bya'o // cho ga'o // de la rnal
T02D1582:43b-9: 'byor ma'i cha lugs su gnas pas mchod pa dang
T02D1582:43b-10: sngags bzlas pa dang bza' ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1582:43b-11: rab tu gsangs nas g-yon pas bya'o //
T02D1582:43b-12: gnas la sogs pa blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar 'dod
T02D1582:43b-13: pas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la dmigs pa gtad
T02D1582:43b-14: nas grong khyer la sogs pas g-yon skor du bskor
T02D1582:43b-15: bar bya'o // 'gro ba la ni dang po rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang nas 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D1582:43b-16: ji ltar bshams pa'i 'dod yon rnam pa lngas rnam
T02D1582:43b-17: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pas
T02D1582:43b-18: som nyi med par longs spyod do //
T02D1582:43b-19: lha dang sngags tha dad du gzung bar mi bya'o //
T02D1582:43b-20: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D1582:43b-21: bcom ldan 'das mas lhag par mos pas rkang pa
T02D1582:43b-22: brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod cing phyag bya'o //
T02D1582:43b-23: sngags dang phyag rgya rang gi rtog pas mi bya zhing gshig par yang mi bya'o //
T02D1582:43b-24: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang nyes pa med pa la mngon spyod kyi las mi bya'o //
T02D1582:43b-25: bud med rnams la brdung ba dang khro ba dang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D1582:43b-26: khyad par du phyag rgya drug 'dzin pa rnams la ma yin no //
T02D1582:43b-27: 'di la sogs pa dam tshig gi rnam pa rgyud
T02D1582:43b-28: kyi rjes su 'brangs pas shes nas bsrung bar bya'o
T02D1582:43b-29: // 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa yang de nyid las shes par rab tu sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1582:43b-30: mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bris te mang po la don med do //
T02D1582:43b-31: bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos //
T02D1582:43b-32: de bzhin bla ma dge 'dun te //
T02D1582:43b-33: bla ma dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1582:43b-34: bla ma nyid ni rgyu rkyen 'gyur //
T02D1582:43b-35: de phyir sangs rgyas thob 'dod pas //
T02D1582:43b-36: bla ma dag ni mnyes par bya //
T02D1582:43b-38: srid pa dag par gyur pa'i yon tan me tog dri bzang 'di ni byas pa yis //
T02D1582:44a-1: lam zhi ba'i 'bras bu'i go 'phang myur du spyod 'dod rten pa na //
T02D1582:44a-2: de tshe mngon par rtogs pa dpag bsam shing las rab byung rgyas par bcud bzang ba'i //
T02D1582:44a-3: shin tu ro ldan sar par gyur pa'i snye ma 'di ni nye bar bsten par gyis //
T02D1582:44a-4: rgyud dang mngon rtogs thabs dag dang //
T02D1582:44a-5: bla ma'i zhal nas sgrub thabs las //
T02D1582:44a-6: bag tsam bsdus nas 'khrul pa med //
T02D1582:44a-8: bdag gis 'di ni byas pa yi //
T02D1582:44a-9: de las byung ba'i dge ba des //
T02D1582:44a-10: 'gro kun rdo rje mdzes ma yi //
T02D1582:44a-11: go 'phang myur du thob par shog ;
T02D1582:44a-12: / dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs mngon
T02D1582:44a-13: par rtogs pa'i snye ma zhes bya ba slob dpon
T02D1582:44a-14: chen po dge ba'i 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa
T02D1582:44a-16: / rgya gar phyogs kyi pandi ta mkhas pa chen
T02D1582:44a-17: po d'a na sh'i las sgra rang 'gyur du byas
